ProjectTitle: Exploring TCA and itaconate metabolism as drivers of CD8+ T cell exhaustion in local metastatic niches
InitialFeedbackHistory:
12/06/2024
The content of you DMP is good, but please note that you used an older DMP template, from 2022 FWO requests DMPs to follow Flemish Standard DMP template. You can find this template in DMPonline.be, or on the FWO website with more information about their DMP requirements (https://www.fwo.be/en/about-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan-dmp/). Please make sure the final DMP that FWO will ask as part of the final report will follow this template, you can copy paste most of the information from the current DMP, but there will be some additional questions mainly about data sharing.
label: good with suggestions
